short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search subjects on VIK Wiki right from your context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of copy-pasting your university subjects to search them on VIK Wiki?

This small add-on gives you an option in your context menu to search for the highlighted text on VIKI Wiki. Every search opens in new tab. The whole add-on is just 10 KB and contains minimal code to operate.
